snippet.title: MEMORIAPOLIS - Gameplay Trailer I PC Steam
snippet.description:
Your reign begins soon, builders! #Memoriapolis early access launches on Steam on August 29th. 👉​ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2228280/MEMORIAPOLIS/

Memoriapolis is a new #citybuilder, that invites players to embark on a captivating journey through four ages (Antiquity, Middle Ages, Renaissance and Age of Englightenment).

⌛​ ​Choose your culture and navigate through distinct historical eras,
🌳​ Manage resources and factions, 
📜​ Face historical events, 
🏙️​ Witness the organic evolution of your city, 
🏰 Construct iconic wonders,
👑​... and transform your modest explorer’s camp at the beginning of Antiquity to a Capital of Capitals at the age of Enlightenment!

𝗙𝗢𝗨𝗥 𝗔𝗚𝗘𝗦. 𝗢𝗡𝗘 𝗖𝗜𝗧𝗬.

For news and details on Memoriapolis, visit https://playmemoriapolis.com or follow Memoriapolis on social media:
🤍​ Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2228280/MEMORIAPOLIS/
💙​ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fivepmstudio
🧡​ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/5_pm_studio/ 
💜​ Discord: https://discord.gg/N4XvMJZ3eV
